_header: To thy journey thou take good heed
Subjects: prognostications; journeys, prognostications concerning; glosses; translations
_description: Couplets scattered in text of Bernardus Sylvestris, Experimentaris…

NYPL120.Transcription:
To þi iorney þu take gode hedefor þerof þu shalt
                    haue good spede
NYPL120.Note:
Added to right margin by original scribe, as a gloss beside Latin text
                    it translates.
